snippet: A practice referred to in a criminal case against an aide in Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s 2009 campaign has been associated for decades with efforts to suppress votes.
lead_paragraph: A practice referred to in a criminal case against an aide in Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s 2009 campaign has been associated for decades with efforts to suppress votes.

headline.main: Roots of ‘Ballot Security’: Dead Voters, Party Fears and Shadowy Tactics
headline.print_headline: The Roots of ‘Ballot Security’: Dead Voters, Party Fears and Shadowy Maneuvers
headline.seo: Ballot Security, an Issue in Consultant’s Trial, Has a Dark Past
